text: My school said my hair was too long  So i shaved it bald to stick it up their asses  I dont know why but my school has a strict rule on boys hair length   Any boys hair may only be   inches or shorter in length  no exceptions regardless of any medical reasons  is a quote from page   in my student handbook received when i started going there  Today on the first day of school since quarintine started in the US the principle walked right in my class in the middle of lunch  and stated that my hair is too long to be allowed on boys  or whatever bullshit she said it sounded fancy that s all I know  IN FRONT OF THW WHOLE CLASS  First she embarrassed me in front of my whole class  then only gives me three days to get a hair cut before I get in trouble  I was devastated to have to get a hair cut  My long hair was how i finally became happy with my body and who I am  When it finally started getting long I actually was happy with how my body was in years  Now I must have it cut  I was so upset and angry that when I got home I got my dads shaver and cut IT ALL off  All of it  Just to stick it to my principle  I did it in protest  even though I was doing what i was supposed to  I don t like how it looks and will probably not be happy with myself until it is long again  But I did get a great satisfaction when I saw my principles face this morning when she saw it  She was shocked and clearly was mad that I took it this far  But she couldn t do anything because i wasn t breaking any rules anymore  And my parents reaction was priceless   I even managed to convince a few of my female friends to shave their heads in protest too  I m trying to get the whole middle school to do it eventually so that maybe my principle can actually change that rule

text: Literally crying for helpI m usually the type of person that keeps everything bottled up  I know you not suppose to  but I can t help it  but as of lately I been having many crying fits  only when I m alone  I have tried to talk to my parents  it kinda helped  but they don t understand  I throw hints in my speech that I m not happy I haven t been in a while I have a lot I m grateful for and happy to have  but overall I m not happy I feel like im going through a midlife crisis at the age of   I don t have any kids I don t have any significant others it s just me by my lonesome i hate I put myself in this position to be this alone I don t vent to anybody and the main person I did vent to was my niece we re like best friend and life screw me over  it s a sad subject to talk about  I use to able to find happiness in my writing  I wrote poems and stories  but now I haven t been motivated to do that simple pleasurable things I once enjoy are now just a distant memory I can t believe I m putting this out there to a bunch of people I don t know but I need help I m literally crying out for help and I m willing to take any advice from somebody because I can t take this anymore alone I m tired of dealing with this ache I have  I have nights where it s hard to sleep more than often and when I do I end up waking up at the middle of the night and mostly cry I want to pray but I m at this point in my life I feel like I m being ignored by God I m just on his waiting list to be answered and I m just tired so please help me and thank you for listening and I m sorry for this long rant
